alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 11:14AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKDT SATURDAY ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER NEAR KWETHLUK... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam. * WHERE...For the Kuskokwim River near Kwethluk. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...An ice jam is causing flooding in Kwethluk, with water overflowing onto roads. Water will continue to rise until the ice jam breaks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1101 AM AKDT, The Alaska State Defense Force reports the water was up to the banks in Kwethluk last night and has significantly overflowed into the village this morning. Impounding water due to the ice jam will cause rapid river rises upstream. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - Please stay tuned to weather.gov/Anchorage, NOAA weather radio or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
